anathema: Calm a crowd, douse a fire, sleep in the same place three nights in a row
edict: Set fires, change the world, act with ambition or not at all
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Lubaiko (The Spark in the Dust)](/Deities.aspx?ID=678)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 17

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Set fires, change the world, act with ambition or not at all

**Anathema** Calm a crowd, douse a fire, sleep in the same place three nights in a row

**Area of Concern**
Wildfire, bad luck, inspiration, turmoil

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=361)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76), [Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=111), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ill Omen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1566)

- **2nd**
[Floating Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=1533)

- **7th**
[Fiery Body](/Spells.aspx?ID=1527)

</column>
name: Lubaiko (The Spark in the Dust)
